scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: These materials document investigations of ARC practices or programs by federal government offices or private consultants. In general, these were not evaluations initiated by the ARC and, as a group, can be viewed as a partial record of ARC's public accountability. For overall evaluations of the ARC, initiated and/or conducted by the ARC, see sections under "Program and Project Files": 1970 Evaluation, Program Design, and Regional Plan. For analyses of specific programs or projects initiated by the ARC, see Final Project Reports--Program Analyses.
